title: Omnium febrium causa latet in sanguine
author: Hill, William.
notes: Also includes: Charltoniana hypothesis de sanguinis ad partium nutritionem ineptitudine est rationi dissentanea.
Signed and dated at end: Jul. 5. 1681. In die comit. resp. pro gradu M.B. Guliel. Hill, coll. D. Joan.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
